channel.title: ::master
channel.description:
can someone give me a ::master command that works for admins+?
ErasedPkz source. (PI)

item.title: ::master
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m writing this in the reply box, don’t judge me.

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && c.playerRights >= 2){//If you're server has people with rights over 4 and they're not staff, you're going to want to change this.
for(int i = 0; i < 25; i++){//Most 317's have 25 skills now, if yours has less, change the 25.
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);//Gives you 13m XP
c.playerLevel[i] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i]);//changes the level of the skill to the right one
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);//Updates the skill
}//End of for loop
c.sendMessage("You master all skills");
//You could put something here to update you're combat level.
}

Read full topic
